Module edu.qut.cab302.wehab
Package edu.qut.cab302.wehab

Class moodRating

java.lang.Object
edu.qut.cab302.wehab.moodRating
public class moodRating extends Object
Represents mood ratings for users, allowing the creation, retrieval, and management of mood data.

      public static void insertMoodRating(int moodRating, String username)
      Inserts a new mood rating into the database for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      moodRating - the mood rating to insert
      username - the username of the user providing the rating

    • getLast7Days

      public static List<moodRating> getLast7Days(String username)
      Retrieves the mood ratings for the last 7 days for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user whose ratings are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of moodRating objects for the last 7 days

    • hasRatedToday

      public static boolean hasRatedToday(String username)
      Checks if the user has rated their mood today.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to check
      Returns:
      true if the user has rated today, false otherwise
